Welcome to adaptiveDesignProcedure’s documentation!¶

A design procedure of the training data for Machine Learning algorithms able to iteratively add datapoints according to function discrete gradient.

Reference & How to cite¶

Most of the theoretical aspects behind adaptiveDesignProcedure are reported in: M. Bracconi and M. Maestri, “Training set design for Machine Learning techniques applied to the approximation of computationally intensive first-principles kinetic models”, Chemical Engineering Journal, 2020, DOI:10.1016/j.cej.2020.125469.

Installation¶

The official distribution is on GitHub, and you can clone the repository using:

git clone https://github.com/mathLab/PyDMD

Change directory:

cd adaptiveDesignProcedure

The adaptiveDesignProcedure class is in the adaptiveDesignProcedure.py file
